review: We love the Fire Stuck! Perfect for upstairs in our bedroom.
author: Megan Miles

review: Wasn't sure that someone a little older and technically challenged would be able to figure this out, but I did!  I use the Fire TV Stick on my tv in the basement when I am on my exercise bike and treadmill.  I now look forward to exercising as I am able to watch a HBO series that I have always wanted to access, but didn't want to spend the money for HBO on cable.  Great invention.
author: Claire Sullivan

review: This works awesome.  I love being able to watch MLBTV and Sling TV with no issues. plus i can watch my prime tv and movies.  I am very impressed
author: JustBrianMeyer

review: Device has poor apps.Cable company I use not offered on hbogo or showtime.The only redeeming point is it comes with a remote.Kindle does not cast well with this device.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love it!! Much easier to use than my chromecast since it has a remote and I don't have to use a separate device to control it.
author: SuperKawaii

review: Finding apps for this thing is very difficult.  We have two Roku sticks in the house besides this, and those are simple to configure and use.  About all I can do with the Fire TV Stick is watch Prime movies and Sling TV.  The Fire Stick doesn't compare to the other options.
author: Mddaddy

review: Great product.  The fire stick exceeds expectations.  The easy to use GUI gave me access to things I never knew my Prime account could do. This is especially great for my child.  Cons: Poor third party app support. You can not "cast" to it.  The fire stick does not support YouTube and that's enough for me to take off an entire star, honestly.
